metadata.title: LUKHΛS AI — T4/0.01% Infrastructure (v0.02-final)
metadata.description:
Institutional-grade, cryptographically verifiable infrastructure for LUKHΛS AI. This release bundles deterministic automation, CI gates, append-only ledgers, SHA256-verified freeze artifacts, and a complete operational playbook. External collaborators can verify integrity via checksums and run the validation checkpoint to reproduce results.

Included: RELEASE_MANIFEST.json, T4_FINAL_SIGNATURE.sha256, T4_CLOSURE_BRIEF.md, FINAL_FREEZE.json, META_REGISTRY.json summary references, and full verification protocol.

Verification: sha256sum -c T4_FINAL_SIGNATURE.sha256 then make validate-t4-strict at tag v0.02-final.
metadata.notes: Health score algorithm: min(50, coverage/2) + 30(SLA) + 20(docs). Coverage baselines for 125/149 modules (83.9%). Eight validation checks green. Freeze tags: v0.01-baseline → v0.02-prod → v0.02-final. Post-freeze policy: immutable main; development continues on develop/v0.03-prep.
metadata.method: Deterministic scripts, append-only ledgers, CI validation, cryptographic artifact verification.
